title: ‘The Cherry on the Cake’: Primož Roglič Convinced He Can Clinch His Tour de France Finisher with Bora-Hansgrohe
content:
Roglič to see stripped-back schedule and heavyweight backing in an all-out push for the victory that would complete his palmarès.

Read the full article at ‘The Cherry on the Cake’: Primož Roglič Convinced He Can Clinch His Tour de France Finisher with Bora-Hansgrohe on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
